item.title: Garden Journal
item.description: Bonus: stickers can be used to personalize it! This one's from the Herdhover project, a friend of HTD! During my final years at college, I created a crude version of a bullet journal to keep track of all the various classes and activities. That planner was a life saver. Post college I stopped using the planner as the activity level dropped; but in the past few years, I found myself needing to record events and thoughts again, and came across bullet journaling.
